short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For assisting GPI distributors in calculating net prices on products listed on our FLOMECÂ® and GPI Pumps websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows for a user to input a percentage which is then calculated to display a product net price excluding GST (for business to business customers), based on a listed product price including GST on FLOMEC and GPI Pump websites.
